meanings.definition: The pointed end of a pen
meanings.sent1: She carefully dipped the nib of the pen into the inkwell.
meanings.sent2: The nib of the pen was sharp and precise, perfect for calligraphy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten batted at the nib of the pen, leaving ink paw prints everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed from the nib of the pen like a river of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The nib of the pen danced across the paper, creating beautiful swirls of ink.

meanings.sent1: The bird used its nib to peck at the seeds on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The colorful bird's nib was long and curved, perfect for catching insects.
meanings.sent3: The cheeky crow stole a shiny coin and hid it under its nib.
meanings.sent4: The eagle's nib gleamed in the sunlight as it soared high above the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The hummingbird's nimble nib darted in and out of the flowers, sipping nectar.

meanings.definition: The tip of a tool or instrument
meanings.sent1: He carefully sharpened the nib of the chisel before carving the intricate design.
meanings.sent2: The nib of the screwdriver fit perfectly into the tiny slot.
meanings.sent3: The chef used the nib of the knife to delicately slice the ripe tomatoes.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush strokes were precise, thanks to the fine nib of the paintbrush.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic replaced the worn-out nib of the drill to ensure smooth operation.
